title.en: Tokidoki Bosotto Roshia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san

altTitles.ja: 時々ボソッとロシア語でデレる隣のアーリャさん

altTitles.ru: Аля, которая сидит рядом со мной, иногда кокетничает со мной по-русски
Аля-сан иногда кокетничает со мной по-русски

altTitles.vi: Arya-san bàn bên thi thoảng lại trêu ghẹo tôi bằng tiếng Nga

altTitles.zh-hk: 不時輕聲地以俄語遮羞的鄰座艾莉同學

altTitles.id: Alya-san Terkadang Menyembunyikan Perasaannya dalam Bahasa Rusia

altTitles.pt-br: Alya-san geralmente esconde seus sentimentos em russo

altTitles.ne: आल्या कहिलेकाहीँ रूसी भाषामा आफ्नो भावना लुकाउँछिन्

altTitles.de: Alya verbirgt manchmal ihre Gefühle auf Russisch

altTitles.en: Alya-san Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian
My Deskmate Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian

altTitles.ja-ro: Tokidoki Bosotto Roshia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san

altTitles.pl: Alya Czasami Ukrywa Swoje Uczucia Używając Rosyjskiego

description.en: Masachika Kuze sits next to Alya, a girl of Russian and Japanese descent. She’s beautiful, haughty, and an exceptional student, while Masachika is nerdy and known for being a slacker. He’s an easy target for her comments in Russian, which she’s all too happy to translate—except he can understand what she’s really saying!
description.it: Masachika Kuze è seduto accanto ad Alya, una ragazza di origine russa e antenati giapponesi. Lei è bella, altezzosa e una studentessa eccezionale, mentre Masachika è secchione e noto per essere un fannullone. È un bersaglio facile per i suoi commenti in russo, che lei è fin troppo felice di tradurre - tranne per il fatto che lui può capire cosa sta dicendo in realtà!
description.ja: 「И на меня тоже обрати внимание」隣の席に座る絶世の銀髪美少女、アーリャさんは時々ロシア語を話す。本人は俺を罵倒していると言うのだが…事実は違う！さっきのロシア語、彼女は「私のことかまってよ」と言っていたのだ！実は俺、久世政近のロシア語リスニングはネイティブレベルなのである。そんな事とは露知らず、今日も甘々なロシア語でデレてくるアーリャさん！全生徒憧れの的、超ハイスペックなロシアンJKとの青春ラブコメディ！
description.pl: Masachika Kuze siedzi obok Alyi, dziewczyny pochodzenia rosyjsko - japońskiego. Jest piękną, wyniosłą i wyjątkową uczennicą, podczas gdy Masachika jest kujonem znanym z bycia leniem. Jest on więc łatwym celem dla jej komentarzy, które chętnie tłumaczy na rosyjski - z wyjątkiem tego, że on może zrozumieć, co mówi naprawdę!
description.ru: Манга по одноимённой новелле! Главный герой – Кудзе Масачика, учится в частном институте Сейрей, куда частенько попадают ученики из разных стран. Вдруг в классе Кудзе появилась новенькая. Девушка с бледной, почти прозрачной кожей, которую невозможно было увидеть у настоящих японцев, и длинными голубыми глазами-щелочками, сияющими, как сапфиры. Это была Аля – Русская девушка, что переехала в Японию...
description.vi:
“И наменятоже обрати внимание”

“Hở, gì thế?”

“Có gì đâu? Tôi nói ‘Cái tên này đúng là đồ ngốc’ ý mà.”

“Cậu thôi cái trò mắng người ta bằng tiếng Nga đi!?”

Arya - cô nàng xinh đẹp tuyệt trần có mái tóc bạch kim ngồi cạnh tôi - đang nở một nụ cười đắc thắng...

Nhưng sự thật thì, câu tiếng Nga cô ấy vừa nói có nghĩa là [Hãy để ý đến tôi đi] cơ!

Tôi - Kuze Masachika - là người có khả năng nghe hiểu tiếng Nga thông thạo như người bản xứ. Nhưng không hề hay biết điều đó, cô nàng Arya hôm nay vẫn tiếp tục thể hiện những cảm xúc rất ngọt ngào bằng tiếng Nga khiến tôi không thể ngừng cười!?

Câu chuyện tình thanh xuân hài hước của tôi với cô nàng nữ sinh trung học gốc Nga hoàn hảo đã bắt đầu như thế...
description.pt-br:
Minha colega de classe que senta ao meu lado é meio-russa, chamada Alya, ela tá sempre provocando e sussurrando em russo, só que ela não sabe que entendo muito bem o idioma russo. 

Assim começa um grande comédia romântica.

title.en: Blue Archive - The Adventure of Game Development Department!

altTitles.ja: ブルーアーカイブゲーム開発部だいぼうけん！

altTitles.vi: Blue Archive: Cuộc phiêu lưu của Câu lạc bộ Phát Triển Game

altTitles.ru: Blue Archive: Грандиозное приключение отдела разработки игр!

description.en: From the hit game Blue Archive, comes a spin-off manga featuring the Game Development Department! Where Momoi, Midori, Yuzu and Aris share their days of youth, friendship, and clumsy moments. A heartwarming, cute and funny youth-comedy crafted by the master of comedy, Asato Mizu!
description.ja: 人気ゲーム「ブルーアーカイブ」よりゲーム開発部のスピンオフが登場！モモイ、ミドリ、ユズ、アリスの4人が送る青春、友情、ぽんこつの日々...。コメディの名手・水あさとが手掛ける、笑えて泣けて可愛い青春コメディ！
description.ru: Спин-офф манга по мотивам популярной игры Blue Archive, в которой девочки из отдела разработки игр делятся смешными историями о своей юности и дружбе. Это душевная и милая история, созданная мастером комедии Мидзу Асато!
description.vi: Bộ truyện chuyển thể từ trò chơi đang làm mưa làm gió "Blue Archive" với sự xuất hiện của Câu lạc bộ Phát Triển Game! Nơi Momoi, Midori, Yuzu và Arisu cùng nhau sẻ chia những năm tháng của tuổi trẻ, tình bạn và những khoảnh khoắc vụng về. Đây là một câu chuyện ấm lòng, hài hước và dễ thương từ Bậc thầy Truyện hài Mizu Asato!

title.en: Koe no Chiisai Komori-san to Kusodeka Oogoe no Oobayashi-kun

altTitles.en: The Quiet Komori-san and the Loud Oobayashi-kun
KOMORI-SAN in a small voice & OBAYASHI-KUN in a loud voice

altTitles.vi: Komori-san trầm lặng và Oobayashi-kun ồn ào

altTitles.ja: 声の小さい小森さんとクソデカ大声の大林くん

altTitles.ko: 목소리가 작은 코모리 양과 목소리가 엄청 큰 오바야시 군

altTitles.zh: 轻声细语小森同学和震耳欲聋大林君

altTitles.en: Komori-san With a Small Voice and Obayashi-kun With a Loud Voice

description.en: Komori-san has a complex about her soft voice, compared to the loud and brash Ohayashi-kun. Their vocal volume may be opposites, but their feelings for each other are mutual. Will they ever be able to properly communicate?
description.es-la: Komori-san tem um complexo sobre sua voz suave, em comparação com o Oobayashi-kun alto e impetuoso. Seu volume vocal pode ser oposto, mas seus sentimentos um pelo outro são mútuos. Eles algum dia serão capazes de se comunicar adequadamente?

title.en: The Old Man Who Was Reincarnated as a Cat

altTitles.ja: ねこに転生したおじさん

description.en: An old man was hit by a truck and found himself reincarnated as a cat.

altTitles.ja: 夢見るメイドのティータイム

description.en:
In the spring of her second year of high school, Fuyuka Yukinoshita starts working part-time at a maid cafe. She dreams of becoming someone who can make people smile, like the manager she admired, but she is always getting flustered by her idiosyncratic co-workers!

It is the magic that makes you smile. A fluffy and sweet moment.
description.es:
En la primavera de su segundo año de instituto, Fuyuka Yukinoshita empieza a trabajar a tiempo parcial en una cafetería. Sueña con convertirse en alguien capaz de hacer sonreír a la gente, como la encargada a la que admiraba, pero sus idiosincrásicas compañeras de trabajo siempre la ponen nerviosa.

Es la magia que te hace sonreír. Un momento esponjoso y dulce.
description.ja:
高校二年の春。メイド喫茶でアルバイトを始めた雪ノ下冬花。
憧れの店長のように誰かを笑顔にできる人になりたいという夢を抱くが、個性的な同僚たちに振り回されて!?
それはあなたを笑顔にする魔法☆ ふわふわで甘々なひと時を♪
description.es-la:
En la primavera de su segundo año de instituto, Fuyuka Yukinoshita empieza a trabajar a tiempo parcial en una cafetería. Sueña con convertirse en alguien capaz de hacer sonreír a la gente, como la encargada a la que admiraba, pero sus idiosincrásicas compañeras de trabajo siempre la ponen nerviosa.

Es la magia que te hace sonreír. Un momento esponjoso y dulce.

altTitles.ja: アイドル×アイドル　ストーリー！

description.en:
Mimi Nagisa (22 years old) is a former idol. After giving up on her dream of being an idol because of her lacking talent she spends her days working part-time while attending college. However, the moment she meets the idol Ibuki Nanakusa, whom she recently found interest in, their lives begin to cross each other.

(Source: Comic Fuz, translated)

[Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/idol2story_info)
description.ja: 才能がないと夢を諦めた元アイドルのミミと、ミミに憧れていた現役アイドル・イブキ。そんな2人が、ひょんな出会いから一緒にサバイバルオーディション番組への出演を目指すことに…!?　一度は諦めかけた夢、今度こそ2人でなら…！
description.ru: Мими Нагиса (22 года) — бывший айдол. После того, как она отказалась от своей мечты стать айдолом из-за отсутствия таланта, она проводит дни работая на неполный рабочий день, учась в колледже. Однако в тот момент, когда она встречает кумира Ибуки Нанакуса, к которому она недавно проявляла интерес, их жизни начинают пересекаться.

altTitles.ja: 灰仭巫覡
カイジンフゲキ

description.en: Night, phenomena that were once known as natural disasters. Faced with the threat of inexplicable destruction, children offer their prayers in the form of dance in order to borrow the power of the gods, quell the Night's fury, and deliver the world from ruin. In a fateful encounter, a boy from a rural town in Japan, Jin, meets Gao, a British soldier who was forced to flee his homeland by the Night. The two spend their halcyon days with their friends in the quiet town surrounded by nature. Until one day, the Night suddenly falls on them once again!
description.ru: Ночь — феномен, некогда считавшийся природной катастрофой. Под угрозой уничтожения от не пойми чего, дети вознесли богам свои молитвы в форме танца, чтобы одолжить их силу, сдержать ярость Ночи и возродить мир из руин. По велению судьбы Дзин, парнишка из захолустного японского городка, встречает Гао, британского солдата, вынужденного покинуть свою страну из-за Ночи. Вдвоём они безмятежно проводили время вместе с друзьями в тихом городке в окружении природы. Пока однажды Ночь вновь не обрушилась на них!

altTitles.ja: メジャー

description.en:
Shigeharu Honda is a Japanese League batter on the rise. His son Goro is a Little League pitcher who one day hopes to follow in his father's footsteps. Momoko Hoshino, Goro's schoolteacher, is the first woman Shigeharu has been interested in since the death of Goro's mother. The destinies of these three individuals will become intertwined as father and son experience both heartbreak and triumph on the baseball diamond. But when an unspeakable tragedy visits the family, it will take everything they have to pick up the pieces and reclaim their dreams.  
  
Won the 41st Shogakukan Manga Award in the Shounen category.

title.en: Onna Chara de Isekai Teni shite Cheatppoi kedo Zako Chara na no de Medatazu Heiwa na Shomin wo Mezashimasu!

altTitles.ja: 女キャラで異世界転移してチートっぽいけど雑魚キャラなので目立たず平和な庶民を目指します！

altTitles.ja-ro: Onna Chara de Isekai Ten'i shite Cheatppoi kedo Zako Chara na no de Medatazu Heiwa na Shomin o Mezashimasu!

altTitles.en: After Reincarnating in Another World as My Sort of Cheat but Small Fry Female Character I will Strive to Live a Peaceful Life of an Ordinary Person!

description.en: A little weary salaryman. One day, after waking up... he found himself in another world in the body of a female character, Susie, from the MMORPG he liked to play. Confused, he tried an attack... and made all the mosters flee to the place people live, afraid of his destructive power that's able to smash a mountain. Having dealt with them, he ended up saving Howard, a local tribune who invited his savior to the village, but...
description.ja: お疲れ気味のサラリーマン。ある日、目が覚めると...やりこんでいたネットゲームの女キャラ・スージィの姿で異世界転移していた。とまどいながらも攻撃を放つと...なぜか山の形を変えてしまうほどの破壊力で、人里のほうに魔獣を散らしてしまう。そしてその対処をしていた護民官ハワードを助けたことをきっかけに、村に招かれることになるのだが――

altTitles.ja: 夜の姫僕
あなた達それでも先生ですかっ！

description.en: One day, school teachers come as freeloaders to the inn run by his parents!? Kazami Hiro, a high school boy, decides to take care of the inn and his future!? Under one roof, The forbidden harem romantic comedy begins!!
description.ja: 親が経営する旅館にある日、居候としてやってきたのは学校の先生たち!? 男子高校生・風見ヒロは旅館のため、自分の未来のためにお世話をすることに!? 一つ屋根の下、禁断のハーレムラブコメが開幕!!

altTitles.ja: 渡くんの××が崩壊寸前

description.en:
Ever since his parents died, Watari Nao's life has revolved around his little sister. He forgoes club activities for the sake of spending time with her, leading many of his peers to label him a siscon. But as long as his sister's happy, Nao is willing to shut out any unwelcome comments about himself.  
  
Unbeknownst to Nao, however, a greater danger has resurfaced - one that destroyed his way of life six years ago, and threatens to do so once again.  
  
And that danger, in the form of a girl wielding a garden hoe, will stop at nothing to reclaim what could once have been hers, and hers alone.
description.ru: С тех пор, как его родители умерли, жизнь Ватари Наото вращалась вокруг своей младшей сестры. Он воздерживается от деятельности клуба ради того, чтобы проводить время с ней, в результате чего многие из его сверстников думают, что он влюблён в свою сестру. Но пока его сестра счастлива, Наото готов закрыть глаза на все эти сплетни. Однако ему угрожает та же опасность, что настигла его шесть лет назад. Эта опасность — девушка, которая не уйдет без того, что когда-то принадлежало ей одной!
description.pt-br: Desde que seus pais morreram, a vida de Watari Nao tem girado em torno de sua irmã mais nova. Ele renuncia atividades do clube por causa de passar tempo com ela, levando muitos de seus colegas para rotulá-lo de SISCON. Mas, enquanto sua irmã estiver feliz, Nao está disposto a calar quaisquer comentários indesejáveis sobre si mesmo. Sem o conhecimento de Nao, no entanto, um perigo maior ressurgiu - um que destruiu seu modo de vida, há seis anos, e ameaça fazê-lo mais uma vez, e o perigo vem sob a forma de uma garota empunhando uma enxada de jardim.

altTitles.ja: 魔女と野獣

description.en:
The stage; a city where "witches" collect people's worship. Who appeared there was a man carrying a coffin, and a girl with a beast's eyes. Their prey, "Witches"! And nothing else. When the evil "witch" and the starved "beast" meet, their magnificent and fierce battle begins!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10214/episode/314025) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/the-witch-and-the-beast/)
description.ja: 舞台は“魔女”が人々の崇拝を集める街――。そこに現れたのは、棺桶を背負う男と、獣の目をした少女。彼等の求める獲物は“魔女”、そのただ一つ。悪しき“魔女”と飢えた“野獣”が出会う時、華麗にして苛烈な戦いの幕が開く！
description.vi:
Ashaf là một anh chàng tao nhã với tác phong tinh tế, mang theo quan tài và đoàn tùy tùng quạ đen. Còn Guideau lại là một cô gái hoang dại, đầy bạo lực, với cặp răng nanh và đôi mắt như loài dã thú.
Bỗng một ngày, bộ đôi kỳ lạ này đặt chân đến thành phố bị thống trị bởi phù thủy - người được tung hô như một vị anh hùng nơi đây. Nhưng cả Ashaf và Guideau đều biết rõ: "Phù thủy là những kẻ mang đến sự nguyền rủa và tai ương". Không một ai có thể cản bước họ, dù có là đám đông phẫn nộ hay là cả một đội quân đi chăng nữa...
Một câu chuyện cổ tích u ám mang phong cách Steampunk & Gothic, đậm đà chất ma thuật! "Phù thủy và Quái thú" chắc chắn sẽ lôi cuốn bất cứ độc giả nào đang ngóng chờ một tựa truyện thể loại hành động và kỳ ảo mới toanh.

altTitles.ru: Приди же в Мир Демонов, Ирума-кун!

altTitles.th: อิรุมะคุงกับโรงเรียนปิศาจ

altTitles.ja: 魔入りました！入間くん

altTitles.id: Selamat datang di sekolah iblis! Iruma-kun

description.en:
Iruma Suzuki, fourteen years old, can’t say no to any request. His irresponsible parents make him work dangerous job after dangerous job to support them, and then one day they sell him to a demon! But, much to his surprise, the demon wants to adopt Iruma as his grandson? Unable to refuse his request, Iruma becomes the grandson of the great demon Sullivan. His new doting demon grandfather enrolls him in Demon School Babyls – where Sullivan is coincidentally the principal. Thus begins Iruma-kun's extraordinary school life among the otherworldly, meeting many colorful demons, taking on daunting challenges, and facing his true self as he rises to become someone great. 

Cozy magical slice of life with occasional urban terrorism.
description.es:
Con una vida bastante desgraciada y unos padres vagos y avaros, Iruma es arrastrado al infierno contra su voluntad después de que estos lo vendan a un demonio. Pero para su sorpresa, la vida que le depara el inframundo es mucho mejor que la que tenía con su familia.

Bajo la tutela de su nuevo dueño, un poderoso, pero solitario demonio que sólo quería cumplir su anhelo de tener un nieto, empieza a asistir a un instituto del que este es director después de firmar cierto contrato con él.

Ahora, Iruma tiene que intentar adaptarse al mundo de los demonios mientras esconde su naturaleza humana y se enfrenta a los distintos desafíos que lo esperan en su nuevo instituto. ¡Su nueva vida demoníaca acaba de empezar!
description.ru: Четырнадцатилетний Судзуки Ирума только что был брошен и продан демону его безответственными родителями! Тем не менее, к своему удивлению, он оказывается теперь живет с демоном, как его приёмный внук. Затем он поступил в школу, где его дед — Салливан, работает в качестве директора. Так начинается необычайная школьная жизнь Ирумы-куна среди потусторонних, встречая много красочных лиц, принимая на себя сложные задачи, и сталкиваясь со своим истинным — я, когда он поднимается, чтобы стать кем-то великим. Уютная волшебная повседневность с случайным городским терроризмом.
description.tr: On dört yaşındaki Iruma Suzuki hiçbir isteğe hayır diyemez. Sorumsuz ailesi, onları geçinmek için onu tehlikeli işlerden tehlikeli işlere koşturtur ve sonra bir gün onu bir iblise satarlar! Ancak iblis, Iruma'yı torunu olarak evlat edinmek isteyince çok şaşırır. Bu isteği reddedemeyen Iruma, büyük iblis Sullivan'ın torunu olur. Yeni sevecen iblis dedesi onu, Sullivan'ın tesadüfen müdürü olduğu İblis Okulu Babyls'e kaydettirir. Böylece Iruma-kun'un diğer dünyadakiler arasındaki sıra dışı okul hayatı başlar; birçok renkli iblisle tanışır, zorlu mücadelelere atılır ve büyük biri olmak için yükselirken gerçek benliğiyle yüzleşir.
description.vi: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun là câu chuyện kể về cậu bé Suzuki Iruma, người đã bị bố mẹ mình kí khế ước bán cho ác ma để đổi lấy tiền tài và bình an. Cậu bé Iruma đáng thương từ lúc mới biết đi (1 tuổi) đã phải "ra xã hội" lăn lộn, buôn ba khắp nơi với hai vị phụ huynh "tưng tửng" cho đến ngày một Ác Ma đến rước cậu đến Ma giới theo khế ước. Tưởng chừng như sắp vào bụng quỷ thì vị Ác Ma già nua này đã khóc lóc yêu cầu cậu làm cháu trai ông ta, với bản tính lương thiện và tốt bụng đến cả bản thân mình cũng phải kinh ngạc, cậu bất đắc dĩ đã đồng ý lời đề nghị đó và nhập học trường Ác Ma theo ý ông ta. Chuyện gì sẽ xảy ra tiếp theo, mời các bạn theo dõi cuộc sống học đường đầy bất thường của Iruma-kun.
description.pt-br:
Iruma Suzuki, de quatorze anos, não pode dizer não a nenhum pedido. Seus pais irresponsáveis ​​o fazem trabalhar em empregos perigosos para sustentá-los, e então um dia eles o vendem para um demônio! Mas, para sua surpresa, o demônio quer adotar Iruma como seu neto?  

Incapaz de recusar seu pedido, Iruma torna-se neto do grande demônio Sullivan. Seu novo avô demônio amoroso o matricula na Demon School Babyls - onde Sullivan é coincidentemente o diretor. Assim começa a extraordinária vida escolar de Iruma-kun entre o outro mundo, encontrando muitos demônios coloridos, enfrentando desafios assustadores e enfrentando seu verdadeiro eu enquanto ele se torna alguém grande.

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 7, Cap 44. ]
[ 2° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 11, Cap 94. ]
[ 3° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 17, metade do Cap 147.]

altTitles.ja: 愛しています、キョーコさん。

altTitles.en: You mean the world to me, Kyoko!

description.en: Always leave work on the dot! Always avoid overtime! Because my beloved Kyouko-san is waiting for me to return.  I love, love, love, love, love, love you, Kyouko-san, who has secrets that I don't know.  A comedic love about vibration and too much love with a little distortion.

altTitles.ja: ピンク

description.en:
Yumiko moonlights as a call girl because her day job doesn’t pay enough to feed her pet Croc. Haru, an aspiring writer who has nothing to say, sleeps with a woman his mother’s age not just for the money but to work on his “powers of observation.” So when Yumi’s step-mom turns out to be Haru’s sugar-mommy, it is time for shenanigans. A little bit of drinking, a little bit of blackmail and a visit with Croc is enough to change lives and maybe add some color to a comfortable but bland life.

Daddy kept Keiko’s mom as a pet; she keeps Haru as a pet; I keep Croc as a pet…Is Yumiko someone else’s pet?? Is she willing to let someone care for her like that? [Kodansha]

altTitles.th: ขบวนการกำมะลอ

altTitles.ja: 戦隊大失格

description.en:
Thirteen years ago, suddenly the Villainous Army of evil appeared in their gigantic floating castle 10000 meters in the sky to invade Earth!

The villainous army have reviving capabilities that make them immortal, making them a serious threat to humanity. To protect us against these invaders, the Divine Dragon Rangers, the Dragon Keepers, wield their miraculous powers and their weapons, Divine Tools, and continuously fight for our safety!

The assault of the Villainous Army! The vigilance of the Dragon Keepers! Will they succeed in their conquest…?

From Haruba Negi, the creator of *5Toubun no Hanayome*, comes the action-packed superhero series of a lifetime!
description.es: ¡Hace trece años, el Ejército Villano del mal apareció de repente en su gigantesco castillo flotante a 10.000 metros en el cielo para invadir la Tierra! El ejército villano tiene capacidades de revivir que los hacen inmortales, lo que los convierte en una seria amenaza para la humanidad. Para protegernos de estos invasores, los Rangers Dragón Divino, los Guardianes del Dragón, empuñan sus poderes milagrosos y sus armas, las Herramientas Divinas, ¡y luchan continuamente por nuestra seguridad! ¡El asalto del Ejército Villano! ¡La vigilancia de los Guardianes del Dragón! ¿Tendrán éxito en su conquista? ¡Descúbrelo en la serie de superhéroes llena de acción de toda la vida!
description.fr:
Il y a 13 ans, un château flottant est apparu à 1000 mètres au-dessus du sol et une armée maléfique est venue dans le but d'envahir l'humanité.
Afin de protéger l'humanité contre ces envahisseurs, des super-héros se battent, mais les choses ne semblent pas être comme elles le paraissent !
description.ru: Тринадцать лет назад армия монстров таинственным образом объявилась на территории людей, паря в воздухе на своем летучем замке! Армия монстров обладает различными способностями, которые могут грозить человеческой безопасности. Дабы защитить мирных жителей от вторжения на землю, доблестные герои - Хранители Дракона в составе из пяти человек выходят на поле правосудия! Используя свой туз в рукаве под названием «артефакт», боевой отряд героев из года в год, каждое воскресенье усмиряет неугомонных монстров. Однако, спустя 999 поражений, один из членов команды монстров решает отомстить героям!.. С этого момента и разворачивается наша история борьбы добра со злом!
description.pt-br: Há treze anos, de repente, o Infame Exército do mal apareceu em seu gigantesco castelo flutuante 10.000 metros no céu para invadir a Terra! O exército vilão tinha capacidades de reviver, o que os tornava imortais, tornando-os uma séria ameaça para a humanidade. Para nos proteger contra esses invasores, os Divine Dragon Rangers, os Dragon Keepers, manejam seus poderes milagrosos e suas armas, Ferramentas Divinas, e lutam continuamente por nossa segurança! O ataque do Exército Vilão! A vigilância dos Dragon Keepers! Eles terão sucesso em sua conquista...?

altTitles.ja: 機巧少女は傷つかない

altTitles.th: สงครามจักรกล มนตราราตรี

description.en:
During the early 20th century, along with technological advancements, scientists were able to develop sophisticated magic. The combination of science and sorcery was Makinot, circuits made from spells that were put into objects to bring them to life and even gain a personality. It was developed as a military weapon and has now spread throughout the world.   
  
Akabane Raishin is now attending the Royal Academy to become the best in the world. Accompanied by the lovely teenage girl Yaya, who is actually Raishin’s puppet weapon, he plans on rocketing to the top of the class. However, his test scores come nearly dead last although his combat skills and determination are second to none. Raishin has to compete with the most deadliest of classmates if he wants to come out as the king.

altTitles.en: How to Live as the Enemy Prince

altTitles.es-la: Cómo vivir como el príncipe enemigo

description.en:
Imagine being kin to your sworn enemy.

Killed in battle while defending his country, Bern wakes up in the body of the enemy prince, Kalian, and vows to avenge his people. But between taming an abusive half-brother and surviving his mother's deadly web of intrigue, sweet revenge seems to slip further beyond his grasp at every turn.

---
I could hear the hum of life in my ears. It was hard to breathe… I raised my gaze and stared into the distance. However, my blurred vision could not see anything. The light began to fade. That was my last memory.

When I opened my eyes once again, it was ten years before that last memory took place. And of all the things I could have become, it was from the enemy country that drove Secretia to ruin – I had become Kyris' third prince, Calian.

…..

Bern was the proud Crown Prince of Secretia who fought and died in the war against Kyris. But he woke up ten years into the past – as the timid Third Prince of Kyris, Calian.
description.tr: Son savaşımda mağlup olduktan sonra beni öldüren “düşman ülke”nin prensi olarak yeniden doğdum. Hem de kaderinde erken ölüm olan Callian olarak. Bu, memleketimi kurtarmam için bana verilen bir şanssa… Düşman ülkenin prensi olarak hayatta kalmaktan başka çarem yok!

description.en: Only music sustained me from the maddening pain. If only I could hear my music... with my own ears... Even as my soul was falling apart, I prayed to God... and prayed again. Ludwig van Beethoven is considered the greatest composer in human history. I closed my eyes like that. And 180 years later in Seoul. The saint of music, known as an immortal genius, has been reborn. <Beethoven Born Again> And then I began to hear the voice of an angel. "Dobin.. Dobin.." Only music sustained me from the maddening pain.
description.id: Hanya musik yang menopangku dari rasa sakit yang menjengkelkan. Andai saja aku bisa mendengarkan musikku… dengan telingaku sendiri… Bahkan ketika jiwaku sedang hancur sekalipun, aku tetap akan berdoa kepada Tuhan… dan berdoa lagi. Ludwig van Beethoven dianggap sebagai komposer terhebat dalam sejarah manusia. Aku menutup mataku seperti itu. Dan 180 tahun kemudian di Seoul. Sang Saint musik, yang dikenal sebagai seorang jenius abadi, telah terlahir kembali. Dan kemudian tiba-tiba aku mulai mendengar suara malaikat. “Dobin.. Dobin..” …

altTitles.ja: やんちゃギャルの安城さんたち
やんちゃギャルの安城さんたち高1編

The Apothecary Diaries: Maomao's Rear Palace Notebook of Mysteries

altTitles.ja: 薬屋のひとりごと～猫猫の後宮謎解き手帳～

description.en:
In the imperial court, a young woman is put into servitude, Maomao. The tale is just beginning for the woman doctor/pharmacist from the red-light district, as rumors circulate about the emperor's children's lives being short-lived. Her curious nature and thirst for knowledge pushes her to action. To satisfy her curiosity, this young doctor/pharmacist will investigate the origin! What is shifting in the imperial court..!?  
  


---
description.ja: 誘拐された挙句、とある大国の後宮に売り飛ばされた薬屋の少女・猫猫（マオマオ）。年季が明けるまで大人しくしようと決めていた猫猫だったが、あるとき皇帝の子どもたちが次々と不審死することを知る。好奇心と少しばかりの正義心、そして薬屋の知識を使い、その謎を調べ始めてから猫猫の運命は大きく変わって…？
description.ru: В императорский двор была доставлена молодая девушка Маомао. История её берёт начало в районе красных фонарей, где начали ходить слухи о том, что жизни детей императора под угрозой. Ею движут любопытство и жажда знаний. Чтобы удовлетворить своё любопытство, молодая целительница будет докапываться до истины! Что же изменится при императорском дворе?!

description.en: The girl who was adopted by two mothers met her soulmate- another girl, when she was 16 years old. After dating for ten years, she decided to give herself to a man at the age of 28 … because she did not want to live this "abnormal life". Only after leaving her, did she finally understand the true meaning of love during those countless days and nights. However, can they still go back to the way things were?

title.en: Soul Land V - Reborn for you

altTitles.en: Soul Land V - Rebirth of Tang San
Combat Continent 5 - Rebirth of Tang San

altTitles.zh: 斗罗大陆 5 重生唐三

description.en: Can a generation of god king be reborn in this world that is not friendly to mankind, can Tang San recover his wife again? What kind of path to rebirth will the all kinds of strange monsters and gods bring to him? All in the journey of a generation of gods to chase his wife, the fifth part of Douluo Dalu, with a reborn Tang San!
description.fr: Une génération de Dieu Roi peut-elle renaître dans ce monde hostile envers la race humaine, pourra t-il retrouver sa femme ? Quel genre de chemin vers la renaissance lui apporteront les monstres et les dieux les plus étranges ? Tout cela dans le voyage d'une génération de dieux à la recherche de sa femme, la cinquième partie de Douluo Dalu, avec un Tang San ressuscité !

The Youngest Son of a Chaebol Family

description.en: Having started from the bottom and worked his way to the top, Hyeonwoo finds himself betrayed by the royal family of Soonyang Group, the largest corporation in South Korea, after providing 13 years of dedicated service. Just when he thinks all his efforts have been made in vain and prepares to embrace his death, he suddenly wakes up in the body of Dojun Jin, the youngest grandson to the founder and CEO of Soonyang, having traveled back in time. Having been granted this second chance, Hyeonwoo begins to lay the foundation for his revenge against his evil relatives.

altTitles.ja: キャプテン翼　ROAD　TO　2002

description.en:
After the World Youth, Japanese players are looking for pro careers in Japan and around the world.  
  
In order to fulfill their dream of World Cup 2002 in Korea and Japan, they must get stronger playing in various club competitions, home and abroad.

title.en: S-Class Hunter Doesn't Want to Be a Villainous Princess

altTitles.ko: S급 헌터는 악역 공녀가 되기 싫습니다

altTitles.ko-ro: S-geup Hunter-neun Agyeok Gongnyeoga Doegi Silseumnida

description.en:
**I'm done with romance, so send me home!**

Kim Yi-Young was just an ordinary civil service exam candidate in South Korea.
After studying for more than four and a half years, she finally passed, a truly ordinary person with nothing but reading novels here and there as a hobby.

However, on the day she went out for a celebratory meal after passing the exam, she got into a traffic accident and died, only to find herself reincarnated into the fantasy hunter novel she was reading.

To her, the "System" offered a way back home.
Determined solely to return home and cuddle her warm cat and adorable Maltese, Cerberus, she gained strength through dozens of regressions.
Signing contracts with the constellations of the original work and dying multiple times, she eventually succeeded in conquering the "Tower" of the original work and defeating the owner of the tower on the final floor.

Now, all that's left is to go home......

Or so she thought!

[Due to an error, instead of returning to the original world, we will reincarnate you into the author's new work!]

I don't need that! All I wanted was my sweet home!
Is that so difficult?! I even got rid of the Tower!?!?!

Moreover, romance fantasy?! Even in my previous life, I didn't care about romance, not one bit!
And to top it off, I didn't even reincarnate into my own body this time, but into the "villainess" of the book!

I'm not afraid of the threats in this world, but I'm worried about being forced into a romance quest.

Can I go home......?
description.ko:
**로맨스는 됐으니까 집에나 보내줘!**
김이영, 그녀는 대한민국의 평범한 공무원 시험 응시생이었다.
그것도 4년 반이 넘는 긴 시간동안 공부 끝에 합격한, 낙이라고는 짬짬이 소설읽는 것밖에 없는 정말 평범한 사람.

그러나 합격을 축하하기 위해 외식을 나간 날 교통사고를 당해 죽고, 자신이 읽던 현태판타지 헌터물에 빙의하고 만다.
그런 이영에게 집으로 돌아갈 수 있는 길을 제안하는 '시스템'.
그녀는 오로지 집에 돌아가서 배 따땃하게 지지고 귀여운 말티즈 켈베로스를 끌어안겠다는 일념 하에 수십 번씩 회귀하며 힘을 길렀다.
원작 속의 성좌들과 계약하고 수차례 죽어가며 원작 속의 '탑'을 공략하여 결국 마지막 층의 지배자, 탑의 주인을 처리하는 데 성공한다. 

이제 남은 건 집으로 가는 것 뿐……,


인줄 알았는데!

[오류로 인해 원래 세상으로의 복귀 대신, 작가의 신작에 빙의시켜드리겠습니다!]

필요 없어! 내가 바란건 내 스윗 홈뿐이었는데!
그게 그렇게 어려워?! 탑도 내가 없애줬는데?!?!

게다가, 로맨스 판타지라니! 이전 빙의에서도 로맨스의 ㄹ도, 아니, ㄹ의 한 획도 신경 안 쓰고 살았는데!
거기에 이전처럼 내 몸으로 책에 빙의한 게 아니라 책 속의 '악녀'에 빙의했다!

이 세계의 위협은 전혀 두렵지 않지만, 로맨스를 강제로 끌어내는 퀘스트는 걱정된다. 

나, 집에 갈 수 있을까……?
description.pt-br:
**Estou farta de romance, então me mandem para casa!**

Kim Yi-Young era apenas uma candidata comum ao exame de serviço civil na Coreia do Sul. Depois de estudar por mais de quatro anos e meio, finalmente passou, uma pessoa verdadeiramente comum que só gostava de ler romances de vez em quando como passatempo.

No entanto, no dia em que saiu para uma refeição comemorativa após passar no exame, sofreu um acidente de trânsito e morreu, apenas para se ver reencarnada no romance de caçadora de fantasia que estava lendo.

Para ela, o "Sistema" ofereceu um caminho de volta para casa. Determinada apenas a voltar para casa e abraçar seu gato e o adorável Maltês, Cerberus, ela ganhou força através de dezenas de regressões. Assinando contratos com as constelações da obra original e morrendo várias vezes, eventualmente conseguiu conquistar a "Torre" da obra original e derrotar o dono da torre no último andar.

Agora, tudo o que resta é voltar para casa......

Ou pelo menos era o que ela pensava!

[Devido a um erro, em vez de retornar ao mundo original, vamos reencarná-la na nova obra do autor!]

Eu não preciso disso! Tudo o que eu queria era minha doce casa! É tão difícil assim?! Até me livrei da Torre!?!?!

Além disso, fantasia romântica?! Nem mesmo na minha vida anterior eu me importava com romance, nem um pouco! E para piorar, nem reencarnei em meu próprio corpo desta vez, mas na "vilã" do livro!

Não tenho medo das ameaças deste mundo, mas estou preocupada em ser forçada a uma busca romântica.

Será que posso voltar para casa......?

title.en: WataMote: No Matter How I Look at It, It's You Guys' Fault I'm Not Popular!

altTitles.en: It's Not My Fault That I'm Not Popular

altTitles.ja: わたモテ
私がモテないのはどう考えてもお前らが悪い!

altTitles.ko: 내가 인기 없는 건 아무리 생각해도 너희들 탓이야!

altTitles.th: สาวมืดมนอลวนหารัก

altTitles.es-la: No importa como lo vea, ¡Es culpa suya que yo no sea popular!

altTitles.ja-ro: Watashi ga Motenai no wa Dou Kangaetemo Omaera ga Warui!

description.en: Kuroki Tomoko is a super popular, high school girl, who has had 50 years of dating experience, and 100 boys… in the Otome game world. In the real world, she is a 15 year old loner, who has all of the qualities of a "mojo." However, when school isn't going as she expected, and she isn't as popular as she had thought she was, she takes a look at herself in the mirror for the first time in a few years, and has some shocking revelations…
description.pl: Główna bohaterka serii – Kuroki Tomoko – jest ultra-popularną uczennicą liceum, która umówiła się już z ponad setką chłopaków… W grach Otome. W realnym świecie jest socjopatką, która zupełnie nie radzi sobie z komunikacją z innymi ludźmi, a w szczególności z płcią przeciwną. Manga opowiada o jej kuriozalnych próbach (z reguły niezbyt udanych) usocjalnienia się i zmienienia się w osobę bardziej popularną.
description.es-la: Kuroki Tomoko, una chica que tiene "50 años de experiencia" en citas y que ha salido con más de un centenar de chicos… en juegos otome. En la vida real acaba de cumplir 15 años y va a dar comienzo su época en el instituto, está convencida de que con sus conocimientos será la más de popular. Una vez comienza el instituto, comienzan a pasar los días y se da cuenta de que no habla con nadie. ¿Cómo es posible? Un simple vistazo al espejo le hace darse cuenta de la realidad: no es precisamente una belleza y parece que hasta puede ser antipática. Poco a poco intentará cambiar para ser popular, pero claro, entre lo que le cuesta y lo que tiene una idea bastante distorsionada de la realidad, no será tan sencillo.

description.en: Choi Seong-woon, achieves the top rank in the game “Lost World,” successfully completing all the game’s achievements. However, his joy doesn’t last long when he receives a suspicious email and is summoned to the real “Lost World,” where he embarks on a competition to become a “god.”
description.ko: 주인공 '최성운'은 게임 '로스트 월드'의 플레이어 랭킹 1위로 게임의 모든 업적을 달성하는데 성공한다. 달성의 기쁨도 잠시 수상한 메일을 받은 '성운'은 진짜 '로스트 월드'로 소환되어 '신'이 되기 위한 경쟁을 시작하게 된다.
description.pt-br: Choi Seong-woon alcança a classificação mais alta no jogo “Lost World”, completando com sucesso todas as conquistas do jogo.  Porém, sua alegria não dura muito quando ele recebe um e-mail suspeito e é convocado para o verdadeiro “Mundo Perdido”, onde embarca em uma competição para se tornar um “deus”.

description.en:
When he was a child, his father was said to have died from a car accident. But what actually caused his death was ‘Medical Negligence’.
Ever since that, his dream was to become a ‘Perfect Doctor’ that would never deny or mistreat a patient.

However, reality was harsh.
His mother was inflicted with an incurable disease, which required a lot of money. He quit his university hospital internship and became a sell-out dermatologist.

While he had stopped in his tracks due to the harshness of reality, a state-of-the-art Artificial Intelligence, ‘A.I. – Ronnie’, came to him.
And thus, his journey to become a perfect doctor started once again.

---

- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Dqr0lp4pDiY)
description.ko:
어릴 적, 아버지가 교통사고를 당했다.
아버지를 죽음으로 몰아간 것은 바로 '의료 방임'.
그 뒤 나의 꿈은 어떤 환자도 거절하지 않는 '만능 의사'가 되는 것이다.

하지만 현실은 가혹했다.
어머니의 불치병, 그로 인해 필요해진 돈.
대학 병원 인턴을 그만둔 나는 피부과 페이닥터로 근근이 살아가고 있었다.

현실의 벽에 멈춰선 나에게 어느 날 최첨단 인공지능 'AI-로니'가 찾아왔다.
인턴부터 다시 시작하게 된 만능 의사의 길.

이번에는 해낼 수 있어.
로니가 있으니까.

---

description.ru:
В детстве ему говорили, что отец погиб в автокатастрофе. Однако на самом деле, он умер из-за "Медицинской халатности". С того самого момента мальчик обзавелся мечтой стать "Идеальный врачом", который никогда не откажет пациенту.

Но реальность жесткая штука. Его мать заболела неизлечимой болезнью и для поддержания жизни нужны были огромные деньги, поэтому герой бросает институт и становится продажным дерматологом.

Он уже думал, что мечте не суждено сбыться,
но появление искусственного интеллекта нового поколения "И.И - Рони" может всё изменить...

---

- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Dqr0lp4pDiY)
description.pt-br:
Quando era criança, disseram que seu pai havia morrido em um acidente de carro. Mas na verdade, a causa de sua morte foi 'Negligência Médica'. Desde então, seu sonho era se tornar um 'Médico Perfeito' que nunca negaria ou maltrataria um paciente.

No entanto, a realidade foi cruel. Sua mãe foi acometida por uma doença incurável que exigia muito dinheiro. Ele abandonou seu estágio no hospital universitário e se tornou um dermatologista vendido.

Enquanto ele havia parado devido à crueldade da realidade, uma Inteligência Artificial de ponta, 'A.I. - Ronnie', veio até ele. E assim, sua jornada para se tornar um médico perfeito começou novamente.

title.en: Konjiki no Word Master - Yuusha Yonin ni Makikomareta Unique Cheat

altTitles.en: The Golden Word Master - The Four Heroes and the Innocent Bystander with the Unique Cheat

altTitles.ru: Мастер золотых слов: Четыре героя и Наблюдатель с Уникальным читом

altTitles.ja: 金色の文字使い-勇者四人に巻き込まれたユニークチート-

altTitles.ko: 금색의 문자술사: 워드 마스터 유니크 치트

description.en:
In an RPG-like fantasy world consumed by warring nations and racial discrimination, the human kingdom summons five high school students from 21st-century Japan for assistance in their conflict with the demonkin. Now those students, with their experience of MMORPGs at their disposal, will hone their skills to protect the human kingdom of Edea.  
  
However, this isn't their story.  
  
Out of the five students, four of them were given the title of Hero and the fifth one the title of Innocent Bystander. He had been summoned by accident since he sat near the other four students. His name is Hiiro Okamura, an aloof bookworm with traveling and reading as his raison d'etre. Hiiro sees no reason to help the human kingdom in their offensive war with the demonkin, seeing that he isn't a Hero and that he has no real obligation to help them, and decides to leave the kingdom to go on his own adventure.  
  
Soon, Hiiro finds out that he has the very unique skill of Word Magic: magic that can materialize the definition of a word. As he travels more and more, he finds many uses for his Word Magic and many opportunities to find books, level up, and gain some of his own companions. Even with the outbreak of war on the horizon, Hiiro stays true to his desire to travel the new world he's in.
description.pt-br: Okamura Hiiro é introvertido e adora livros. Para ele, os livros são a sua razão de ser. Sua história começa com costume de invocar heróis de outro mundo. Cinco pessoas convocados, mas um deles é apenas um estranho arrastado acidentalmente, essa pessoa é Hiiro. Os outros quatro são seus colegas de classe, mas não é como se eles fossem amigos. Ao contrário dele, eles são riajuus (Pessoas normais na sociedade contrário de Otaku). Hiiro decidiu não para ajudar o país, a sua razão? "Eu não acredito em você. Eu não sou amigo deles. Não é da minha conta, e eu sou uma pessoa comum que se importa com a minha própria vida, então bye", e ele estabelece a sua própria jornada. Pouco sabem os outros heróis, que esta pessoa comum, Hiiro, na verdade esconde um poder que poderá mudar o mundo!

description.en:
Nigris, an adventurer who has a rare "appraisal" skill and specializes in "healing magic." He supported the S-rank party behind the scenes, but was deemed incompetent and exiled. Nigris begins his career as a solo adventurer with a fresh start, but his destiny begins to change when he meets the elf slave girl Fels and the thunder master Alisa. "Wha, what is this power...!" Nigris' talent blooms, and they demonstrate incredible power! Together with his trusted companions, Nigris will make a name for himself as an adventurer. Nigris and his friends, who are unrivaled with unstoppable momentum that surpasses even S-rank parties, eventually get involved in a riot that threatens the country!

title.en: Lord Baby Runs a Romance Fantasy With Cash

altTitles.en: Miss Baby Runs a Fantasy Romance With Cash

altTitles.uk: Лорд дитина запускає романтичну фантазію готівкою

altTitles.id: Bayibro Menjalankan Romansa Fantasi dengan Cash

altTitles.zh: 宝贝用罗盘玩转罗曼史

altTitles.en: Surviving A Ro-Fan Baby With Coin

altTitles.es-la: La Bebé Lleva Una Fantasía Romántica Con Dinero

description.en:
I lived without a home or family and suffered until I died, but then an 'angel' appeared and made me an offer.

"You, a professional reader of rofan novels, would you like to be reincarnated into a world created based on rofan?"

Because he said that my (handsome) Dad and my (handsome) older brothers will fed me with a diamond spoon, I was reborn...

—They say I might be a child born from my mother's affair?

As soon as I was born, I was handed over to my relatives and became a servant, facing abuse.

"At this rate, I might freeze to death or starve to death alone."

There's nothing I can do about this situation.

"Daddy, take me away—!"

Let's find a way to survive somehow.
But...

[You have fulfilled the conditions.]
[The trait <Rush and Cash> has awakened.]

[Dear reader, do not hesitate to use any means and methods to obtain what you desire. Conquer and seize it!
Romance novel readers don't back down in situations like this!
Show your abilities!
-Condition: Persuade the Duke of Pheraton and obtain the <Summoning Medium>.
-Reward: 5,000 cash draw ticket.
-Quest rejection penalty: Game over in life.
-Quest failure penalty: Game over in life.]

"So, the quest is to kiss my Dad on the cheek?"

...I've been scammed.
description.es-la: Viví sufriendo sin hogar, sin religión, sin padres, pero apareció un ángel y me reencarnó. “Tú, una profesional en lo que respecta a las novelas de fantasía romántica, ¿te gustaría reencarnar en un mundo creado a partir de una novela de fantasía romántica?” Reencarné porque dijo que tendría un padre (guapo) y un hermano mayor (guapo) que me daría de comer con una cuchara e incluso me regalaría una mina de diamantes, pero... -¿Podría ser una niña de la aventura de mi madre? Tan pronto como nací, me enviaron a la casa de mi madre y caí en una familia que me priva. "¡Si me quedo así, podría terminar congelándome o muriéndome de hambre!"

description.en: “The Change” brought dungeons filled with monsters into the world, altering reality forever. Pro-gamer Jin Jungdo, whose lifelong dream was to be a hero like the Mana Users who fight in these dungeons, is crushed when he discovers his own abilities are useless. Just then, the “real universe” gives him a set of skills that allow him to draw information from the future and heroes from the past! Now all that’s left is for him to barrel through this game of luck and become the strongest hunter ever!
description.fr: Le pire jour de ma vie, j’ai reçu un miracle comme cadeau de la part du  »véritable univers ».
description.ko: 전 재산을 쏟아부어 헌터로 각성했는데… 전투형 스킬 하나 없는 소통, 인내, 게임 탤런트뿐이라고? 헌터 사무소 영업직 인생은 이제 그만 살고 싶다고...! 간절히 바라면 이루어지는가! 인생 최악의 날, 우주로부터 최강의 스킬을 얻었다! 클래스를 뒤집는 운빨 갓겜이 시작된다. <뽑기로 강해진 SSS급 헌터>
description.ru: В один из худших дней в моей жизни, на меня снизошло чудо в виде подарка от "вселенной".

altTitles.en: I Want to Write Your Heart into Kanji

description.en: A high school boy, Yomi Hashiba, is troubled. He is unable to understand what Mizuki Hanai, a cool girl who became his girlfriend a month ago, is thinking... One day, while he is worrying about his relationship with Mizuki Hanai, he starts to understand her "Kanji"...? (same pronunciation as feeling) This is the beginning of a thrilling coming-of-age romantic comedy about love and kanji!
description.id: Seorang anak SMA, Yomi Hashiba, sedang bermasalah. Dia tidak dapat memahami apa yang dipikirkan Mizuki Hanai, seorang gadis keren yang menjadi pacarnya sebulan yang lalu... Suatu hari, ketika dia mengkhawatirkan hubungannya dengan Mizuki Hanai, dia mulai memahami "Kanji" -nya... ? (pengucapan yang sama dengan perasaan) Ini adalah awal dari komedi romantis dewasa yang mendebarkan tentang cinta dan kanji!
description.es-la: Un chico de preparatoria, Yomi Hashiba, está preocupado. No puede entender lo que está pensando Mizuki Hanai, una chica genial que se convirtió en su novia hace un mes... Un día, mientras se preocupa por su relación con Mizuki Hanai, comienza a entender su "Kanji"... ? (caracter/sentimiento) ¡Este es el comienzo de una emocionante comedia romántica sobre la mayoría de edad sobre el amor y los kanji!

description.en: Ayaka Sakurai is an excellent student, but she gets nervous at exams, so she had to settle for a lesser high school than she expected. However, her teacher offered Ayaka a recommendation letter to the school of her choice if she could convince the delinquent girl Sora Honda to come to school. When Ayaka visited Sora at her home, Sora was quite willing to go back to school, if Ayaka would agree to do one thing…
description.ru: Ради рекомендации в престижный университет Аяка Сакурай вынуждена каждый день выполнять просьбы своей одноклассницы, Соры Хонды. В первый же день она попросила её о поцелуе, что же будет на следующий?
description.es-la: Ayaka Sakurai es una excelente estudiante, pero se pone nerviosa en los exámenes, por lo que tuvo que conformarse con una escuela secundaria menor de lo que esperaba. Sin embargo, su maestra le ofreció a Ayaka una carta de recomendación para la escuela(universidad) de su elección si podía convencer a la delincuente Sora Honda de que fuera a la escuela. Cuando Ayaka visitó a Honda en su casa, ella estaba dispuesta a volver a la escuela, si Ayaka accedía a hacer algunas "cosas"...
description.pt-br: Ayaka Sakurai é uma excelente aluna, mas fica nervosa nos exames, por isso teve que se contentar com uma escola inferior do que esperava. No entanto, sua professora ofereceu a ela uma carta de recomendação para a escola de sua escolha, se ela pudesse convencer a garota delinquente, Sora Honda, a ir à escola. Quando Ayaka visitou Sora em sua casa, Sora estava bastante disposta a voltar para a escola, se Ayaka concordasse em fazer uma coisa…

altTitles.es-la: Cazador de destinos de clase F

description.en:
In a world of abilities known as fortunes, Seo Gangrim brings misfortune to those around him. Despite his low rank, people fear his power to steal fortunes from the dead.

After his entire sect is annihilated by an assassin, Gangrim returns to the past, desperate to prevent its grisly end. He intends to make a difference this time but realizes that even fortunes aren't set in stone.

Will Gangrim be able to save his comrades from their unjust deaths, or will he only bring doom to them all again?
In Fgo fight, two contenders among the many servants in the world of Fate/Grand Order fight each other in a simulated confrontation to test their skills!

altTitles.ja: ガチアクタ

description.en:
A slum where criminals' descendants live... People beyond the border look down and discriminate them as "tribal people." Ludo, an orphan boy, lives in the slum with his foster parent, Legt, and makes a living using his extraordinary physical abilities. However, one day, he was accused for a crime he didn't commit., and is thrown into the "abyss" which even the slum people fear.

---
Living in the slums of a wealthy town, Rudo and his foster father Legto try to coexist with the rest of the town's residents, but Rudo despises the wastefulness of the upper class. Ignoring the warnings from those around him, Rudo regularly rummages through the town's garbage in search of anything useful or valuable to save from the "Abyss"—a massive hole where anything considered trash is dumped, including people. Rudo's biological father was one such person, having been thrown into the Abyss after he was accused of murder.

One day, after running into a mysterious figure on the way home, Rudo returns to find Legto's dying body on the floor. He is immediately found at the scene by the authorities and is charged with murder. No one believes his claims of innocence, and he is thrown into the Abyss. Instead of dying, however, he finds himself in a strange, foul-smelling place surrounded by monsters made out of trash.

When Rudo is attacked by said monsters, he is saved by a man named Engine, who reveals himself to be a "janitor"—someone who uses special weapons called "jinkis" to combat these creatures. In order to get his revenge on the one who killed Legto, Rudo reluctantly becomes a janitor to fight his way back up and out of the Abyss.

---

description.fa:
در اطـــــــراف حلبی‌آباد  پرتـگاهی وجـو د دارد که هرکـس مرتکب
خلافی شود به آنجا پـــــرت می‌شــود. رودو یتــیمی است که   در 
آنجا زندگی میکند اما روزی  به‌خاطر یک پاپوش او را به اشــــــــد
مجازات محکوم می‌کنند.
description.id:
Di daerah kumuh dimana keturunan kriminal tinggal... orang-orang yang di luar perbatasan mendiskriminasi dan merendahkan mereka sebagai "orang suku.". rudo, anak yatim, yang tinggal di daerah kumuh dengan orang tua angkatnya, regto, dan bertahan hidup menggunakan kemampuan fisik hebatnya. bagaimanapun, suatu hari, dia dituduh melakukan kejahatan yang dia tidak lakukan, dan dilempar ke dalam "abyss" yang bahkan orang-orang di daerah kumu bahkan ditakuti.'
Tinggal di daerah kumuh dari kota makmur, Rudo dan ayah angkatnya regto mencoba untuk bersahabat dengan orang-orang kota, tapi rudo membenci borosnya orang kelas atas. mengabaikan peringatan dari sekitarnya, Rudo mengais sampah melalui tempat pembuangan kota untuk mencari barang-barang bernilai atau berguna untuk diselamatkan dari "abyss"- lubang besar dimana apapun yang dianggap sampah dibuang ke sana, termasuk manusia. Ayah kandung Rudo termasuk orang itu, yang dilempar ke dalalm Abys setelah dia difitnah melakukan pembunuhan.
Suatu hari, setelah lari dari sesosok misterius saat jalan pulang, Rudo menemukan tubuh sekarat Regto terbaring di lantai. dia dengan segera ditemukan di tkp oleh petugas dan dijatuhi dengan pembunuhan. Tidak seorangpun percaya ketidak bersalahannya, dan dia dilempar ke Abyss. Alih-alih mati, dia menemukan dirinya di tempat aneh, dan berbau busuk yang dikelilingi oleh monster yang terbuat dari sampah.
Ketika rudo diserang oleh monster itu, dia diselamatkan oleh pria yang bernama enjin, yang menyebut dirinya sebagai "janitor"- seseorang yang menggunakan senjata spesial yang disebut "jinki" untuk melawan makhluk itu. Agar dapat balas dendam pada orang yang membunuh Regto, Rudo dengan enggan menjadi seorang janitor untuk dapat kembali ke atas dan keluar dari Abyss.
description.ja: 犯罪者の子孫たちが暮らすスラム街。境界線の向こうの人々からは「族民」とさげすまれ、差別を受けていた。孤児だった少年・ルドは、育ての親であるレグトと共にスラム街に住み、常人離れした身体能力を武器に生計を立てていた。だがある日、身に覚えのない罪を着せられ、スラムの人々でさえ恐れる「奈落」へと落とされてしまう……。
description.es-la:
Barrios marginales habitados por descendientes de delincuentes. La gente de fuera de la frontera los desprecia y discrimina como "gente de la tribu". Ludo, un niño huérfano, vive en el barrio bajo con su padre adoptivo Legto, y se gana la vida utilizando sus extraordinarias habilidades físicas. Sin embargo, un día es acusado de un crimen que no cometió y se ve abocado al "abismo" que hasta los habitantes de los barrios bajos temen.

(Source: Pocket Magazine)
description.pt-br: O grito redundante da alma que vem do fundo do poço em direção ao mundo infestado pelo desprezo e segregação! O subúrbio onde vivem os descendentes dos criminosos. Mesmo assim o Ludo vivia em meio à esse ambiente, de cabeça erguida, mas......!?

description.en: Faced with doomsday, the special power inside Ling Mo was woken up. He found out that he could control zombies. Therefore he could walk through the zombie crowd safe and sound using his power, and eventually, he met his beloved girlfriend - Ye Lian, but only to find out that she had already been transformed into a zombie. To help Ye retrieve her memories, Ling Mo started his survival in doomsday.
description.pl: W obliczu dnia zagłady, Ling Mo przebudził wewnątrz siebie specjalną moc. Odkrył on, że może kontrolować zombie. Dlatego mógł bezpiecznie przejść przez tłum zombie i przeżyć, a ostatecznie spotkał swoją ukochaną dziewczynę - Ye Lian, ale tylko by dowiedzieć się, że została już przekształcona w zombie. Aby pomóc Ye odzyskać swoje wspomnienia, Ling Mo rozpoczął swoje przetrwanie podczas apokalipsy.
description.pt-br: Diante do apocalypse, o poder especial dentro de Ling Mo foi despertado. Ele descobriu que podia controlar os zumbis. Por causa de seu poder, Ele podia caminhar em segurança através de hordas de zumbis, e, eventualmente, ele se reencontrou com sua amada namorada – Ye Lian, Apenas para descobrir que ela já havia se transformado em um zumbi. Para ajudá-la a recuperar suas memórias, Ling Mo embarca em uma jornada para sobreviver no apocalypse.

description.en:
In a world where the remnants of civilization depend on the Awakened, humans with special powers, to fend off otherworldly monsters, Kim Sunwoo is forced to survive as a mere guide for the Awakened.

Just when he thinks his nightmarish days will never end, he's given a mission to protect one of the few remaining safe cities in exchange for a better life!

It is then that a strange voice echoes in his head, and he discovers a power that could change the course of the war against monsters forever.

---

- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PMOJHUW5tJk)
description.ko:
전 세계적인 마물들의 등장으로 수십억 인구가 죽은 대재앙.
가까스로 살아남은 생존자 중 일부는 마물들에게 대적할 수 있는 ‘각성자’가 되었고, 그렇지 못한 일반인과는 넘을 수 없는 벽이 존재했다.

각성자들의 마물 토벌을 안내하는 일반인 길잡이 김선우.
각성자의 죽음 앞에 선 그의 머릿속에 목소리가 들려온다.

"죽여."
"죽이고 힘을 빼앗아!"

description.en: Chloe, who works as an apprentice priestess in a remote church, is a money-loving girl who makes a lot of money at night by gambling at cards, using her insight and memory as weapons. When Erald, a rich holy knight, visits her, he asks her to infiltrate the church as a candidate for sainthood and find the murderer who committed a murder two years ago...?
description.ja: 辺境の教会で神官見習いとして働くクロエは、持ち前の洞察力と記憶力を武器に、夜な夜なカード賭博で荒稼ぎするお金大好き少女。そんな彼女のもとを訪れた成金聖騎士エラルドは、「聖女候補として大教会に潜入し、二年前の殺人事件の犯人を見つけてほしい」とクロエに依頼をして‥‥！？

description.en:
Seo MoonYeob was the world’s greatest superhuman, who sacrificed himself after saving humanity.

Thought to have been dead, he returns 17 years later to a now-peaceful world,
and the superhuman sport faces seismic change.

The story of a modern-fantasy sports-action starts now!
description.ko:
인류를 구하고 홀로 희생한 영웅, 최강의 초인 서문엽.
죽었다고 알려진 그가 17년 후의 평화로운 세상에 돌연 귀환하면서
초인들의 스포츠 <배틀필드>에는 지각변동이 일어나기 시작한다.

본격 현대 판타지 X 스포츠 X 액션!

description.en: One day, university students Maki and Yaeko encounter a man injured by a Kojien that fell from the sky. The man is bleeding from the head but refuses to go to an ambulance or the police, and there is something wrong with him. Furthermore, since meeting this man, Maki and Yaeko begin to see strange things.

altTitles.pt-br: Os Cavaleiros do Zodíaco – Next Dimension: A Saga de Hades

altTitles.ja-ro: Saint Seiya - Next Dimension - Meiō Shinwa

altTitles.ja: 聖闘士星矢 NEXT DIMENSION 冥王神話

description.en: Saint Seiya: Next Dimension - The Myth of Hades, also known as simply Next Dimension, is an ongoing manga written and illustrated by Masami Kurumada. It is a prequel and continuation to his manga series Saint Seiya; placed during the previous "Holy War" between the deities Hades and Athena and their respective minions, the Specters and the Saints, during the 18th century in the franchise's fictional chronology. It is published by Akita Shoten in the weekly magazine Weekly Shōnen Champion at irregular dates. It is also known by its alternate subtitle Galaxy Myth (銀河神話 Ginga Shinwa?), which is used during publication to refer to the segments of the storyline set in the 20th century, as opposed to the Myth of Hades subtitle, which refers to the segments set in the 18th century.
description.pt-br: Continuação direta de Saint Seiya (Os Cavaleiros do Zodíaco). Em 1990, em Elysium, os cinco Saint's (Cavaleiros), Seiya, Hyoga, Shun, Shiryu e Ikki estão lutando contra o deus Hades. Durante a batalha, Hades começa lembrando que ele tenha visto o rosto de Seiya antes e chega à conclusão de que ele enfrentou antes, e assim começa a história... Athena para tentar ajudar Seiya que foi ferido nessa batalha pela espada sagrada de Hades, volta para o passado com a ajuda de Crhonos o Titã do Tempo, para tentar destruir a espada mas as coisas não saem bem como ela queria...

description.en:
Jiwoo is a kind-hearted young man who harnesses the lightning quick reflexes of a cat to secretly make the world a better place – one saved little child or foster pet at a time. Kayden is a secret agent on the run, who finds himself stuck in the body of a …um… decidedly fat old fluffy cat. Together, armed with Jiwoo’s super powers and Kayden’s uber-smarts, they’re out to fight those forces who would let evil rule this world. That is, if they can stand each other long enough to get the job done.

По дороге Кайден встречает обычную дворовую кошку и, почти не думая, решает вселиться в ее тело. Со Чжи У - энергичный и общительный молодой человек из средней школы, который очень любит кошек. description.en:
The Mystic Lunar Dance Troupe took in Jin Sohan as an orphan, and he spent his childhood with them. But one day, one of the four great demons, the Venom Demon, discovered that he was special and kidnapped him. After all kinds of tests, he decided to raise him as his disciple. Ten years later, Jin Sohan tried to look for traces of the Mystic Lunar Dance Troupe, but the Sword Dance Troupe had already been destroyed at the hands of the Unorthodox Faction that’s now ruling over his hometown.

---
Kidnapped as a child to be trained in the art of poison, Sohan Jin returns to his hometown in search of the group of New Moon Sword Dancers who raised him. However, upon his return, Sohan discovers the sword dancers have been defeated by a nefarious sect that now rules the area, with some members having been abducted. What would have been a heartwarming reunion transforms into a quest for revenge as Sohan begins his search for the remaining sword dancers, and he’s willing to poison anyone who gets in his way.

---

description.ko:
진소한은 본디 고아 출신이었으나, 
현월검무단이 거두어 그녀들과 어린 시절을 함께 보낸다.  
하지만 어느 날 그의 특수한 신체 특성을 알아본 사대악인 중 하나인 독마에게 납치당하고, 
온갖 실험 끝에 결국 제자로까지 키워지게 된다. 
10년 뒤, 그는 현월검무단의 흔적을 찾아보려 하지만, 
검무단은 이미 고향을 지배하는 흑도들의 손에 사라져 버렸는데!

《狂魔重生》编剧新作！
恶人之徒出山惩治黑道！
陈少寒原本是孤儿出身，但被弦月剑舞班收留，在弦月剑舞班度过了美好的童年。可是有一天，四大恶人之一毒魔将陈少寒绑架，并将其培养成了弟子。十年后，陈少寒回到故乡，试图寻找弦月剑舞班的痕迹，但剑舞班早已消失在了黑道手中!
